name: Tehran-Darband
description:
each of us has a vision of the city or area where we live.
The “Tehran, Darband” series, however, is only a name to me.
A word that is consumed and heard.
It’s a picture of everyday engagement, of a place which no longer exists; like all other places where the presence of human does not signify prosperity, but anonymity; the more anonymous than all human beings.

*Darband is the name of an area in Tehran (capital of Iran), also it means to be in prison in Persian literature. All of the photos were taken in the Darband area.
